title: Textures
brief_description: Explores the factors which influence our impression of texture: light, point of view and function. Visual examples range from Henry Moore’s sculptures to simple kitchen utensils. Combines a sensitive use of close-up photography with a percussion score by Herb Harris. No other credtits available.
